SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.Messages

Class SetupMessage

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.Messages.Message
it.polimi.ingsw.network.Messages.SetupMessage
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class SetupMessage extends Message
This is a message that contains all the elements needed by clients to begin a game. Such as libraries, usernames, grid, cards etc.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • SetupMessage

      public SetupMessage(int firstCommonGoalCardPoints, int secondCommonGoalCardPoints, int personalGoalNumber, int firstCommonGoalCardId, int secondCommonGoalCardId, int centralPointCard, ObjectCard[][] grid, String[] playerNames, ArrayList<Couple> personalGoalCard, String[] commonGoalCards, ArrayList<Couple<String,Integer>> playersPoints, ObjectCard[][]... playersLibraries)
      Constructor: Creates a setup message
      Parameters:
      firstCommonGoalCardPoints - points on common goal card 1
      secondCommonGoalCardPoints - points on common goal card 2
      personalGoalNumber - the ID of a personal goal card (GUI)
      firstCommonGoalCardId - the ID of the first common goal card (GUI)
      secondCommonGoalCardId - the ID of the second common goal card (GUI)
      centralPointCard - the points on the grid
      grid - the central grid representation
      playerNames - a list of player names
      personalGoalCard - a representation of the personal goal card for CLI
      commonGoalCards - the descriptions of common goal cards
      playersPoints - map of players point
      playersLibraries - a vector of players libraries
